title: Your Best Leads Are Hiding in 5 Different Places
productionNotes: This video aims to highlight the pain points of scattered lead management and showcase Synthex as the solution. The video will utilize a combination of screen recordings, stock footage, motion graphics, and a professional voiceover to deliver a compelling message. Accurate timing and smooth transitions are crucial for maintaining viewer engagement.

scenes.visualDescription: Split-screen showing 5 different business tools simultaneously. Left side: Gmail inbox with 35 unread emails, chaotic notifications. Top-right corner: Facebook Messenger conversation thread. Bottom-right: Google Sheet with outdated contact list (timestamp '3 weeks ago'). Center overlay: Slack notification pinging. Bottom: Handwritten notepad with barely legible lead names.
scenes.voiceoverScript: Your leads are everywhere. Gmail. Facebook. Text. Google Sheets. Your notebook. No one knows which lead is actually hot.
scenes.soundDesign: Chaotic notification layer (email ping, message ding, slack bloop)

scenes.visualDescription: Salesperson frantically searching through emails. Quick cuts: typing in Gmail search box, getting 47 results, scrolling endlessly. Corner timer display: '6:45 wasted looking for one lead'. Frustrated facial expression, sighing.
scenes.voiceoverScript: You spend 6-8 hours per week just digging. And half the time? You still miss the hot ones.
scenes.soundDesign: Typing sounds, frustrated sighs, clock ticking.
scenes.statsDisplay: 21x less likely to qualify a lead if you wait 30 min vs 5 min (MIT)

scenes.visualDescription: Close-up of email from hot prospect. Subject: 'We'd love to learn more, we're ready to move forward this month'. This email gets buried in the 47 unread messages. Animation: Email sinking into inbox, disappearing. Cut to: Same prospect closing deal with competitor. On-screen notification appears: 'Your competitor just won this deal'. Timeline shows only 3 hours elapsed between inquiry and competitor close.
scenes.voiceoverScript: That prospect waited 3 hours for a response. Your competitor responded in 15 minutes. They closed the deal.
scenes.soundDesign: Email notification, whoosh sound effect for sinking email, deal closing sound, sad trombone sound effect
textOnScreen: 78% of customers buy from the FIRST company that responds

scenes.visualDescription: Same 5 chaotic tools transition into ONE unified Synthex dashboard. Animation: All leads flowing and consolidating into single clean interface. Dashboard appears: Modern, professional, organized. All leads auto-organize by urgency color-coding (RED=hot, ORANGE=warm, GREEN=follow-up). Top lead highlighted in RED: High-intent prospect clearly marked. Salesperson finds the hot lead in 10 seconds (not 8 hours). One-click response interface appears with pre-written personalized suggestion. Message sends immediately. Green checkmark appearsâ€”deal closing notification. Money in account notification flashes briefly.
scenes.voiceoverScript: Synthex pulls every lead into one place. It reads each one. Tells you which ones are actually ready to buy. You respond in minutes, not hours.
scenes.soundDesign: Smooth transition sound effect, positive notification sounds, cash register sound.
textOnScreen: Found in 10 seconds. Responded in 3 minutes. Deal closed.
scenes.ctaText: Stop losing deals to disorganization. Try Synthex free.
